Articles.Content:
Hi all.

I am trying to fix my modded install and I really don't know if kethane is working under 1.0.4

What is your experience?

Greetings

Zeke

I don't believe it is, but Kethane as a whole is pretty outdated as far as ISRU mods go. For one, ISRU is in the stock game now. Two, Karbonite has pretty much overtaken it as the mod option for ISRU.

Which is a shame, naturally, because Kethane is one of those mods that hits right in the nostalgia.

Thanks for the quick reply!

I am relatively new to KSP, but Kethane was love at first sight for me and it's a pity we can't use it anymore....

Thanks and good gaming!
Mod question moved to the mod subforums.
